Comment: "Since 2013, WEF received nearly **$60 million** from U.S. taxpayers."  [https://www.openthebooks.com/substack-its-time-that-us-taxpayers-defund-the-davos-sponsor--world-economic-forum/](https://www.openthebooks.com/substack-its-time-that-us-taxpayers-defund-the-davos-sponsor--world-economic-forum/)     WEF mission statement:  "The World Economic Forum is the International Organization for Public-Private Cooperation. It provides a global, impartial and not-for-profit platform for meaningful connection between stakeholders to establish trust, and build initiatives for cooperation and progress."  What a load of buzzword bullshit. It sounds like a bad resume objective: to obtain a meaningful position whereby I can foster public and private cooperation in an ever-changing global environment.  That's definitely something our tax dollars should go toward.
Author: cossbobo
